divs: sighting detailsi had just arrived at a back yard gathering at a friends house on the evening of july 18, 2009. as i was greeting others and introducing some friends i brought i noticed a bright orange orb about 1\3 the size of the moon moving across the night sky a fair distance away. it was traveling rather fast and had absolutely no blinking lights required to identify itself as a plane or helicopter. it was heading in a westerly direction and i kept my eye on it for about a minute before other people began to notice it. as more and more people began to question what it was the object suddenly came to a complete stop in the sky and floated there for about another minute before becoming noticeably dimmer and dimmer and eventually faded away completely in front of mine and about 30 others eyes.
Summary: Orange ball silently moved across the night sky at a fairly fast pace before coming to a complete hault and then slowly became smaller and smaller until it disappeared completely.
trends: There have been 76 other sightings in Calgary
There were no other sightings in Calgary on or around July 18th 2009
